tree.name: Kyle Kuzma
tree.tradeDescription: Bucks trade Khris Middleton to Wizards for Kyle Kuzma and Jericho Sims
tree.note: Part of midseason trade that also returned Jericho Sims

assetsGivenUp.name: Khris Middleton
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Pistons trade Middleton and Brandon Knight to Bucks for Brandon Jennings
assetsGivenUp.note: Middleton played 12 seasons for MIL (2013-2025), 3x All-Star
